pageContext.claim: “And now Christopher Steele admits that it's a fake because he got sued by rich people. I should have sued him too.”
pageContext.analysis: Steele's firm denied Trump's comments. “Yesterday @realDonaldTrump made false claims about us,” Orbis Business Intelligence, which is run by former British spy Christopher Steele, said in a tweet. “He wildly exaggerated our fees and, contrary to his claims we have never stated any of our reporting is ‘fake’. [sic] We stand by the integrity of our research on Kremlin interference in the 2016 election and support for Trump.”
